Bash(git -C "C:/Users/gram/myautomation/automationmaster" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Reorganize StructureAnalysis tabs to eliminate content duplication

Reorganized the analysis results tabs to provide clear separation of concerns and avoid duplicate content:

- Overview Tab: Simplified to show only core summary and quick statistics
  - Removed detailed creator intent and workflow (moved to Patterns tab)
  - Focused on high-level metrics and complexity assessment

- Diagram Tab: Enhanced with relationship details
  - Added comprehensive data flow and relationship descriptions
  - Maintained visual Mermaid diagram as primary content

- Sheets Tab: Expanded with formula analysis
  - Added detailed formula breakdown by function type
  - Now receives full analysis prop for formula details
  - Shows sheet role, structure, and computational complexity

- Patterns Tab: Consolidated workflow and business logic
  - Moved workflow design from Overview tab
  - Consolidated data patterns, business logic, and pain points
  - Provides comprehensive view of operational patterns

- Recommendations Tab: Structured improvement suggestions
  - Organized by complexity assessment, actionable suggestions, and conversion benefits
  - Clear categorization of improvements by priority

Changes:
- Enhanced StructureAnalysis component with improved tab organization
- Updated page.tsx to pass full analysis prop for formula details
- Improved user experience with clearer information architecture

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

fix: Improve sheet reference detection in formulas

Enhanced the sheet reference detection to catch both quoted and unquoted sheet names in formulas. Previously, only sheet names wrapped in single quotes (e.g., ''ì‹œíŠ¸ ì´ë¦„''!) were detected.

Changes:
- Added detection for unquoted sheet references (e.g., ì‹œíŠ¸ì´ë¦„!A1)
- Now captures references with Korean characters, numbers, underscores, dots, and hyphens
- Both patterns are checked: /''([^'']+)''!/g and /([A-Za-z0-9ê°€-íž£_\-.]+)!/g

This fixes the issue where sheet relationships weren''t appearing in the diagram when referenced without quotes (e.g., "ë¶€ì„œ êµ¬ë¶„ê°’_25.9ì›”" being referenced by "29.9ì›”ê¸‰ì—¬ERP_data").

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/gram/myautomation/automationmaster" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Phase 2-5 - Complete code generation workflow with conversation history

Implemented comprehensive code generation workflow system with AI conversation tracking, menu-based code organization, and version management.

## Phase 2: Data Management Layer
- conversation-storage.ts: LocalStorage-based conversation history management
  * Auto-save on code generation + manual save option
  * Filter by code generation, menu conversion, saved status
  * Automatic cleanup of old conversations (30+ days)
  * Link conversations to code menus

- code-menu-storage.ts: Menu-based code organization and version control
  * Create/update/delete code menus with categories
  * Add/edit/delete code versions (1:N relationship)
  * Toggle version status (draft â†” final)
  * Set active version, build tree view structure
  * Track version history with timestamps

- types/conversation.ts: Conversation type definitions
  * ConversationRecord with messages, linked menus, save status
  * Filter, sort, and statistics interfaces

## Phase 3: Component Development
- ConversationHistory.tsx: Browse and manage AI chat history
  * Search and filter conversations
  * Convert conversations to code menus
  * Toggle favorite and saved status
  * Delete old conversations

- CodeMenuManager.tsx: Menu-based code organization with tree view
  * Create/edit/delete menus with natural language descriptions
  * Tree view by category with expand/collapse
  * Favorite and organize menus
  * Auto-complete for categories

- CodeVersionList.tsx: Version management for each menu
  * Add/edit/delete code versions
  * Toggle draft/final status with visual indicators
  * Set active version (only one active per menu)
  * Code preview with timestamps

## Phase 4: Workflow Integration
- CodeGenerationWorkflow.tsx: Main orchestration component
  * 3-step workflow navigation (Chat â†’ Menu â†’ Library)
  * Auto-save conversations on code generation
  * Auto-generate menus from conversations
  * Seamless flow between steps

## Phase 5: UI Integration
- StructureAnalysis.tsx: Integrated CodeGenerationWorkflow into ''ì½”ë“œ ìƒì„±'' tab
  * Replaced placeholder with complete workflow
  * Pass all required props and callbacks

## Features Implemented
âœ… AI conversation auto-save and manual save
âœ… Convert conversations to code menus automatically
âœ… Menu-based code organization with categories
âœ… Version management (1:N: one menu, multiple versions)
âœ… Draft/Final status with visual indicators
âœ… Active version selection
âœ… Tree view with category hierarchy
âœ… Search and filter across all entities
âœ… Favorite/unfavorite menus and conversations
âœ… Timestamps and activity tracking
âœ… LocalStorage persistence

## Technical Stack
- React 18 with TypeScript
- LocalStorage for client-side persistence
- Date handling and formatting
- Component composition and prop drilling
- Lucide icons for UI elements

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
